description: AMD implementation for dust.js, providing module loading, environment detection (browser, Node.js, Java), and text fetching mechanisms.

methods.name: fetchText
methods.description: Fetches text content from environment-specific sources (Node.js, browser, Java).

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads a dust template, processes it, and makes it available as a module.

methods.name: process
methods.description: Transforms HTML content into a dust module with compile and render functions.
